Summary: Fireball in sky south of Fort Myers, Florida
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Myers
There were no other sightings in Fort Myers on or around January 11th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsVery bright light seen traveling from East to West from Southwest Florida International Airport, in the south (Naples area). The leading edge was very large and bright with a tail extending from the back. From the size of the object I don't beleive it would have been possible for it not to hit somewhere (It couldn't have burned up completely.). Color was white.
